Package Inputs

Class Input

java.lang.Object
Inputs.Input
public class Input extends Object
This is an Input class. Input class consist of Keyboard and Mouse inputs and there are several methods. Some of which checks whether key or button is pressed,up or down. Some getters and so on...

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Input()
    This class implements receiving input from Keyboard and mouse
